document.full_text: india delivered the victory their nation demanded on wednesday with a world cup semi-final win by 29 runs over pakistan in front of a dancing, cheering crowd in the northern indian town of mohali.
document.title: india delivers cricket victory to grateful nation
lines_and_colors: india delivered the victory their nation demanded on wednesday with a world cup semi-final win by 29 runs over pakistan in front of a dancing, cheering crowd in the northern indian town of mohali.
